Class oracle.html.Hidden

Class oracle.html.Hidden 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.Hidden
public class Hidden
extends Item
Description:

The Hidden class encapsulates a Hidden field. The user does not interact with this field; instead, the VALUE attribute specifies the value of the field

Instructions:

Use this class to add a NAME/VALUE pair to be encoded in the FORM Submission URL which you don't want to be displayed.

Example: 

// Create an Hidden object
Hidden hd = new Hidden("hidden information id", "encrypted information");

See Also:
Form

Hidden(String, String)
Creates a Hidden Object

print()
Print the content of object as HTML string to System.out

Returns the start tag of this object

Returns content of object as HTML string
Implementation Note: Objct should be both browser-independent and browser-aware
